content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-21, -74)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-21.0, y=-73.0) mining copper ore
- Iron chest (x=-21.5, y=-74.5) storing copper ore
- Burner inserter (x=-20.5, y=-74.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (x=-19.0, y=-74.0) smelting copper plates

###Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (-2, -76)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-2.0, y=-76.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace (x=-1.0, y=-74.0)
- Burner inserter (x=0.5, y=-74.5)
- Iron chest (x=1.5, y=-74.5) storing iron plates
- Iron chest (x=0.5, y=-72.5) storing iron plates

###Iron Plate Processing Setup at (3, -73)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (x=3.0, y=-73.0)
- Stone furnace (x=5.0, y=-73.0)
- Burner inserter (x=2.5, y=-74.5) moving items from chest
- Burner inserter (x=6.5, y=-72.5)
- Iron chest (x=7.5, y=-72.5) storing iron plates
- Iron chest (x=3.5, y=-71.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Incorrect Inserter Configuration
- Ensure inserters are properly aligned with their pickup and drop positions
- The inserter at (x=2.5, y=-74.5) has no valid destination entity to drop items into, causing blocked output

### Resource Management Issues
- Mining drills are running out of fuel, ensure consistent fuel supply
- Some furnaces have no ingredients to smelt despite having fuel, check input logistics

### Space Management
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warnings - ensure proper input logistics are set up
- Some furnaces show "furnace result is full" - ensure output is being cleared regularly

### Entity Placement
- Ensure entities are placed with proper spacing and alignment to allow inserters to function correctly
- Check that inserters have valid pickup and drop locations before placement
